00017 void initMinimizer(Minimizer* mini, int n, double precision)
00018 {
00019   mini->n = n;;
00020   mini->m = 6;
00021   mini->diag = (double*) malloc(mini->n*sizeof(double));
00022   mini->w = (double*) malloc((mini->n*(2*mini->m+1)+2*mini->m)*sizeof(double));
00023   mini->diagco = 0;
00024   mini->iprint[0] = -1;
00025   mini->iprint[1] = 0;
00026   mini->eps = precision;
00027   mini->xtol = DBL_EPSILON;
00028   mini->iflag = 0;
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 int MinimizerStep(Minimizer* mini, double* x, const double H, const double* dH)
00033 {
00034   FORTRAN(lbfgs)(&mini->n, &mini->m, x, &H, dH,
00035                  &mini->diagco, mini->diag, mini->iprint, 
00036                  &mini->eps, &mini->xtol, mini->w, &mini->iflag);
00037 
00038   return (mini->iflag == 1);
00039 }
